meanings.definition: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to treat pain and inflammation.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed naproxens for my back pain.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy ran out of naproxens, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook naproxens for candy and almost ate them!
meanings.sent4: Her relief was like a wave washing over her after taking naproxens.
meanings.sent5: The naproxens worked like magic, easing the pain in just a few hours.

meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed two naproxens for my headache.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy more naproxens for my medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent3: I found a jar full of naproxens in the back of the cupboard.
meanings.sent4: The naproxens on the shelf looked like tiny soldiers standing in a row.
meanings.sent5: The naproxens rattled in the bottle like marbles as I shook it.
